name: What do penguins dream about?
description:
This game was made as part of Mini Jam 105 with the theme : Dreamy!
It is a Test Version and not complete yet :D 

Controls with W A S D and SPACE for using yor collected Power-Ups.

Support us on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/chilledpenguinstudios

Music used in this first version:

Wintersong by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Playing In The Wind by BatchBug | https://soundcloud.com/batchbug/ Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Awakening Dew by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

White Petals by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
